title: What are some ambient music? - Quora

response.answer_text: I H’s answer is very good in my opinion. Anyway, here are some ambient music what I like. Some is strictly ambient, some is an approach: Laraaji & Brian Eno - “The Dance #3” (1980) 1991 - “No More Dreams V” (2016) A Asher Yates - “Chidren of May” (2016) Abraxas - “Xolotl” (2016) Aepiel - “Aves” (2012) Andrew Chalk - “Apart From You” (2016) Anne Garner - “Be Life” (2015) ASC - “All Come To Ruin” (2016) Asherchill - “Look I’ll Be There” (2016) Benoît Pioulard - “Upon The Break Arch” (2015) Bjarki - “Amelyn” (2016) Black To Comm - “Frost” (2009) Blair French - “Before Mornings Arrivals” (2014) Boreal Taiga - “Train To Narvik” (2011) Brian Eno - “Always Returning” (1983) Bruised Skies - “Distant” (2013) Bvdub & Loscil - “Hypnos” (2013) C V L T S - “Flooded Forest/Microrangers” (2010) Carl Stone - “Banteay Srey” (1992) Celer - “Distant Misgivings” (2015) Chihei Hatakeyama - “Ferrum” (2011) China Crisis - “Jean Walks In Fresh Fields” (1981) Chuck Johnson - “Calamus” (2017) Claire M Singer - “Wrangham” (2016) Clark - “Fractal Dismembered” (2012) Claude Larson - “Memory Image” (1986) Clouds In My Home - “First” (2009) Coastal Miner - “Common Ground” (2016) Coastlands - “85 Belongs To The Dead” (2016) Confessor - “Haunted” (2017) Croatian Amor - “Like Man” (2016) Etc, etc, etcSorry for the long answer, I hope you’ll like it anyway and I’ll can be useful

Here is a list of songs from the artists I enjoy the most, or at least, give the most attention: The Slow Dancing Society - Under the Sodium Lights Aphex Twin - Stone In Focus Flowers for Bodysnatchers - A Heart Less Darkened Susumu Yokota - Blue Sky and Yellow Sunflower MogueHeart - Universe Is The Answer Solar Fields - The Missing Carbon Based Lifeforms - VLA Cigarettes After Sex - Nothing's Gonna Hurt You Baby Carbon Based Lifeforms - Photosynthesis Hiroshi Yoshimura - View from My Window Emancipator - Time for Space Phaeleh - In The Twilight Some of these songs fall under downtempo, some under space ambient, and at least one falling under dark ambient. Knock yourself out.
